Package org.jboss.msc.txn

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbortResult<T extends Transaction>
    Transaction's abort phase result.
    Attachable  
    CommitResult<T extends Transaction>
    Transaction's commit phase result.
    Executable<T>
    A task that may succeed or fail which may also produce a consumable result.
    ExecuteContext<T>
    Context for a task that may also create new tasks.
    Factory<T>
    A factory for new instances.
    Listener<R>
    A listener for a value.
    PrepareResult<T extends Transaction>
    Transaction's prepare phase result.
    ReportableContext  
    Revertible
    A task which executes during the transaction rollback phase.
    RollbackContext
    The context for a rollback operation.
    RollbackResult<T extends Transaction>
    Transaction's rollback phase result.
    TaskBuilder<T>
    A builder for subtasks.
    TaskController<T>  
    WorkContext<T>
    Context for a task.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArjunaResource
    A transaction controller's resource for interacting with ArjunaCore.
    AttachmentKey<T>
    A key for a transaction attachment.
    BasicTransaction  
    CompletionListener<R>
    Transaction completion utility listener that allows synchronized wait for transaction phase to be completed.
    Location
    A location description for a Problem.
    Problem
    A description of a subtask execution failure.
    ProblemReport
    A problem report.
    StopFailedServiceTask
    Task that stops a failed service.
    Transaction
    A transaction.
    TransactionController
    A transaction controller, creates transactions and manages them.
    TransactionManagementScheme<T extends Transaction>
    Base class for transaction management schemes.
    TransactionXAResourceManager  
    XATransaction
    An XA transaction, which cannot be managed by the user.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Location.Nesting
    The nesting type for a location within a location.
    Problem.Severity
    The severity of a problem.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidTransactionStateException
    Exception thrown when an operation cannot be executed because of the current transaction state; for example, adding a service to a transaction which has been marked for rollback.
